statements: UPDATE nano_material_stability SET temperature = 30.5, humidity = 0.6 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE nano_material_stability SET material_name = 'Nanotube', stability_condition = 'Stable' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE nano_material_stability SET stability_condition = 'stable', temperature = 25.5, humidity = 60 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE nano_material_stability SET material_name = 'Graphene Sheets', humidity = 75, stability_condition = 'unstable' WHERE id = 2
UPDATE MaterialStability SET pressure = 100 WHERE material_id = 1
UPDATE QualityControl SET test_result = 'Passed' WHERE qc_id = 3
UPDATE MaterialStability SET stability_condition='Stable', temperature=25.5, pressure=100.0 WHERE material_id=1;
UPDATE QualityControl SET test_result='Pass', test_date='2022-08-15' WHERE qc_id=2;
UPDATE stability_conditions SET temperature = 25.5, humidity = 60.0 WHERE material_name = 'Sample A';
UPDATE stability_data SET stability_score = 8.3, comments = 'Sample passed quality control' WHERE experiment_id = 101;
UPDATE stability_conditions SET temperature = 25.5, pressure = 1013.25 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE quality_control SET pass = true, timestamp = '2022-09-15 10:30:00' FROM stability_conditions WHERE stability_conditions.id = quality_control.experiment_id AND material_name = 'Sample A';
UPDATE NanoMaterial SET stability_rating = 4.5 WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE QualityControl SET control_passed = TRUE WHERE control_id = 3;
UPDATE NanoMaterial SET stability_rating = 8.5 WHERE material_id = 1;
UPDATE QualityControl SET control_passed = false, control_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE control_id = 3;
UPDATE NanoMaterials SET temperature = 25.5, humidity = 60.0 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE StabilityTests SET test_result = 'Pass' WHERE test_id = 1001;
UPDATE NanoMaterials SET material_name = 'Carbon Nanotubes', temperature = 25.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE StabilityTests SET test_result = 'Pass', test_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE test_id = 1;
